sentences.sContent: It was so large and complex, they initially assumed it was a bacterium.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was so large and complex, they initially assumed it was a bacterium.
sentences.sCn: 由于它们是如此庞大和复杂，最初被认为是一种细菌。

sentences.sContent: They also converted one species of bacterium into another through a “genome transplant”.
sentences.sContent_eng: They also converted one species of bacterium into another through a “genome transplant”.
sentences.sCn: 他们还通过“基因移植”，把一个物种的细菌转变为另一种。

sentences.sContent: But it might be time to update that list. Because scientists have found a bacterium that can do without phosphorus—live on arsenic instead.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it might be time to update that list. Because scientists have found a bacterium that can do without phosphorus—live on arsenic instead.
sentences.sCn: 但也许是时候更新这份必需元素目录了，因为科学家们发现一种细菌会用砷来代替磷，不需要磷也可生存。
